title: Security Affairs newsletter Round 476 by Pierluigi Paganini – INTERNATIONAL EDITION

description: Taiwanese manufacturer giant ASUS addressed a critical remote authentication bypass vulnerability impacting several router models. ASUS addresses a critical remote authentication bypass vulnerability, tracked as CVE-2024-3080 (CVSS v3.1 score: 9.8), impacting seven router models. The flaw is an authentication bypass issue that a remote attacker can exploit to log into the device without authentication. The flaw impacts […]
title: ASUS fixed critical remote authentication bypass bug in several routers
